column2: "Dɛm ntsi David sii mu fii hɔ kɔree
column3: na ofii nsa kɔr Adullam ɔbo tu mu: na no nuanom
column4: na n'egya na ne fifo nyinara tsee no
column5: wosii mu kɔr ne nkyɛn wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na obiara a no ho akyer no
column4: na obiara a no werɛ ahow no boaboaa hɔn ano kɔr ne nkyɛn; na ɔbɛyɛɛ safohen wɔ hɔn do: na mbarimba bɛyɛ ahaanan na wɔbɛkaa no ho."

column2: "Na David fii hɔ sii mu kɔr Mizpe wɔ Moab: na ɔsee Moabhen no dɛ
column4: ma m'egya na me na nye hom mbɛtsena nkodu dɛ mubohu dza Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ ama me ana."

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn baa Moabhen no n'enyim: na wɔnye no tsenae wɔ mber a David wɔ otu no mu no nyinara."
"Na nkɔnhyɛnyi Gad see David dɛ
column3: Mma nntsena otu no mu; fi hɔ
column4: na kɔ Juda asaase do. Na David fii hɔ
column5: na ɔbaa Heret kwaa no mu."

column2: "Na Saul tsee dɛ woehu David na mbarimba a wɔka no ho no: afei nna Saul tse Gibea
column3: wɔ  tamarisk   dua a ɔwɔ Rama no n'ase
column4: ne peaa dze ne nsamu
column5: na no nkowaa nyinara gyinagyina no ho."

column2: "Na Saul see no nkowaa a wogyinagyina no ho no dɛ
column4: hom ntsie ɛ; aso Jesse ne ba no na ɔbɛmema hom nyinara nhaban
column6: anaa ɔno na ɔbɛhyehyɛ hom nyinara mpem do asafohemfo na ɔha do asafohemfo;"

column2: "ma dɛm ntsi hom nyinara apam me tsir do
column3: na me ba nye Jesse ne ba no yɛ kor a
column4: obiara nnka nnkyerɛ me
column5: na hom mu obiara nndzi yaw mma me
column6: anaa onntue m'aso dɛ me ba ahyɛ m'akowaa tsirmu dɛ ɔnye me ndzi esi
column8: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi?"

column2: "Nna Edomnyi Doeg a ogyina Saul no nkowaa no nkyɛn no
column4: Muhun Jesse ne ba no dɛ ɔaba Nob

column2: "Na obisaa EWURADZE maa no
column4: na ɔdze Filistianyi Goliat n'afona no maa no."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no somae ma wokehyiaa ɔsɔfo Ahimelek
column4: na n'egya ne fiefo nyinara
column5: asɔfo a wɔwɔ Nob no; na hɔn nyinara wɔbaa ɔhen no ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column4: tsie ɛ. Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Na Saul see no dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom apam me tsir do
column4: ɔwo na Jesse ne ba no
column10: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi?"

column2: "Nna Ahimelek buaa ɔhen no
column4: Na wo nkowaa nyinara hɔn mu woana na odzi nokwar dɛ David a ɔyɛ ɔhen n'asew no
column5: na wɔafa no akɔ w'apamfo mu
column6: na wodzi no nyi wɔ wo fie no?"

column2: "Ana ndɛ na mahyɛ ase dɛ mibisa Nyankopɔn ama no? Iyi ɔmpar me: mma ɔhen mmfa asɛm biara nnto n'akowaa do
column3: na m'egya fifo nyinara so do: na w'akowaa nnyim iyi nyinara ho hwee
column4: kumaabi o

column2: "Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column4: Ahimelek

column2: "Na ɔhen no see brampafo a wogyinagyina no ho no dɛ
column4: na wonku EWURADZE n'asɔfoe no; osiandɛ hɔn so wɔboa David
column6: na wɔammbɛka annkyerɛ me. Na ɔhen no no nkowaa no wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔtsen hɔn nsa ka EWURADZE n'asɔfoe no."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Doeg dɛ
column4: na tu hyɛ asɔfo no do. Na Edomnyi Doeg daan noho
column5: na otui hyɛɛ asɔfo no do
column6: na okum nyimpa a wɔhyɛ ndwera asɔfontar eduowɔtwe enum da no."

column2: "Na Nob
column3: asɔfo no hɔn kurow no so
column4: ɔdze afona anomu kum hɔn

column2: "Na Ahimelek
column4: ne mbabanyin mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Abiathar no fii nsa

column2: "Na Abiathar kaa kyerɛɛ David dɛ Saul eku EWURADZE n'asɔfoe no."
"Na David see Abiathar dɛ
column3: Da no ara a nna Edomnyi Doeg wɔ hɔ no
column4: nna muhun dɛ ɔyɛ dɛn ara a
column5: ɔbɛka akyerɛ Saul: emi na mama w'egya ne fie nyimpa nyinara woewu."

column2: "Enye me ntsena
column3: mma nnsuro; na nyia ɔrohwehwɛ eku me no ara nna ɔrohwehwɛ eku wo so: na me nkyɛn dze mobɔbɔ wo ho ban."
